title: [RIDGELINE] Walking to Bath, London's Greatness
content:
Ridgeline subscribers —
Back from England! Nobody got COVID.1 We walked from Cheltenham to Bath, about 75 miles (121 kilometers) all told. The weather was merciful — six days of sun and one of rain — and even that rainy day was a nice shakeup (helped us remember where we were and how grateful we were for the other days). Got a little sun kissed, which was not on the bingo card.
